website_summaries.verdict: This vegan protein powder packs a lot of protein per serving and is available in several different flavors.
pros: Includes 160 calories and 30 grams of protein per serving along with 5 grams of BCAAs
Non-GMO with protein from pea protein, pumpkin seed protein, and sunflower seeds
cons: Doesn't mix well with a blender bottle and some say the most recent formula is too sweet

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Metal Contamination
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Vega's Vanilla Protein for a little over half a year now. I loved the nutritional label and how 'clean' the ingredients were. Unfortunately I have come to find out Vega was tested as one of the worst brands polluted with toxic metals and other contaminants. They declined to comment on the study, which further confirmed my suspicion. I will no longer be repurchasing. If you also care about ingesting these heavy metals . . . you shouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the taste and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I have been using VEGA protein powders for at least a year. I really like the taste and consistency, but I am so upset and angry with the brands because it just showed that most of its products and especailly this one has a high level of lead and arsenic. HOW IS THAT POSSIBLY!!!! this is terrible! Please check the rates and results on Cleanlabelproject.com
customer_reviews.author: carla zenis

customer_reviews.title: Its strong chemical taste made me sick
customer_reviews.text: The strong chemical taste in this protein powder is so bad that it made me vomit. This protein powder may have been expired or came from a bad batch. There are large chunks of powder/chemicals that won't dissolve. This company charges a high price for protein, and they refuse to have a return policy probably because they know so many customers like me want and deserve our money back! I'm still sick and very weak from drinking this. DO NOT BUY THIS PROTEIN POWDER! Amazon needs to take the "Amazon's Choice" label OFF this product immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I use it. Read the label if you like it buy it for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Bigrob808

customer_reviews.title: Ignore “Heavy Metal” nonsense
customer_reviews.text: These people fear mongering “heavy metals” should take the 30 seconds to study the subject. Those substances are in every plant you’ve ever eaten in your life, and because this product is made by people who respect your body, it has retained the minerals found naturally in the same plants. Further, that Clean Label study has been butchered by the scientific community as disingenuous for these same reasons. Yes, this product has the most of those plant materials, because it is in fact the purest plant product. If you want Whey go get it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Lead and Arsenic DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I used Vega for over a year and loved it. Someone made a comment on their Instagram page about having high (not to mention toxic) levels of arsenic and lead in it!!! I did some research and found out that it is true. They boast about being healthy but sneak deadly crap in their products. Do not buy!! If you're looking for a good plant based protein, buy AMPD products. And no, I'm not affiliated with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: I tried out the vanilla flavor and it just doesn't taste very good. Even after shaking the bottle for a while it just doesn't mix well either. I initially bought this because of the advertisement on 30 grams of protein a scoop. Most other proteins only offer 24-25grams of protein a scoop and I thought I was getting a great protein. Turns out these guys found a loophole and just made a bigger scoop. Wish I looked into the details before buying this
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder out there!
customer_reviews.text: The best protein powder out there. I have searched far and wide for a tasty plant based protein powder, palatable enough for a quick shake ( mix with only almond milk) and this is it for me!! I have tried other vega flavors, sunwarrior and numerous other brands. This is the least grainy/chalky and the slight tangy flavor offsets its sweetness. .... and it mixes very easily. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doc PPP

customer_reviews.title: Best Veggie Protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: The best vegetarian (vegan) protein powder on the market! Been using this for years, but only after trying just about every other kind of vegetarian protein powder. Pretty much every other one is grainy and tastes like vitamins YUK! This one is creamy (vanilla) and also has a ton of protein, probiotics, and almost no carbs! I add a tablespoon of peanut butter powder and it's heavenly! Gonna get the chocolate next, for the first time. I can only imagine it'll taste even better than the vanilla, especially with added peanut butter powder!
customer_reviews.author: brandon scheinuck

customer_reviews.title: The best tasting Vegan Protein Powder, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink this one all the time until I saw all the hype about heavy metals, arsenic, etc...contained in it. Started exploring other options but could never find anything nearly as good tasting. I started doing research on the "heavy metals" topic and discovered that the amount that this product contains is no more than whatever fruits and vegetables are growing in the ground that you would eat (obviously it varies from area to area some). I have no concerns at all now and I am glad to be back with my favorite protein powder! And no, I do not work for Vega.
customer_reviews.author: onza

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like peanut butter at all
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the peanut butter flavor. I am not sure why it is labeled as the "mocha" flavor. I have enjoyed the previous flavors of the Vega Sport protein but this flavor just misses the mark completely. I am super disappointed because it tastes nothing like peanut butter. The taste is very "earthy" and the pea protein flavor definitely takes over. I gave this product two stars for the high protein content and thick texture. If you are expecting a peanut butter flavor, be prepared to be let down :(
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Energizer Protein
customer_reviews.text: I am not a meat eater and I need a protein supplement that I will actually take. Vega Sport is excellent -- that taste is absolutely easy to manage (I'm pretty picky). I recommend cold water and a shaker with a small internal whisk. Mine is Pie Lattes, but anything that blends easily and quickly will do. The most marvelous outcome from using this powder is that I can tell immediately, the next day, the difference in my energy level. It is marked and sustained as long as I use the powder. I am an active 70 year old, 90 pounds, 5 feet. I've been using this for more than a year and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndel

customer_reviews.title: Bad After Taste
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use along with my Keto Diet and while it fits my macros for Keto, the after taste and smell on this are horrible. Product doesn't blend well and I often got big chunks of unmixed product in the bottom of my blender cup. It was so hard to drink unless you filled the cup with ice after blending. Don't recommend and won't be getting it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Green Sludge.
customer_reviews.text: Vegan protein powder can be a little more dense, especially soy-free formulations. Still, when we mixed this protein powder into our oatmeal, it turned into a sickly green-olive glop that looked, and tasted, like it would be right at home in a Dickens novel. I tried the powder without grains, with milk, and with water, as well. I'll finish the jug, because of the price, but nobody else at the house will touch it a second time. Family consensus is that we much prefer Orgain, if we're avoiding dairy and Muscle Milk.
customer_reviews.author: SJ and SF

customer_reviews.title: Best plant based protein on the market
customer_reviews.text: Due to dietary needs, I need to switch from a whey protein to a plant based. I had tried plant based in the past and they were always chalky, so needing to switch to plant based wasn't ideal for me. It was recommended to try Vega so I did. I was BLOWN away. This is soooo smooth and the flavor is perfect. It blends well in smoothies and is great on it's own. I prefer it on it's own because it's that good. I won't be trying anything new because there is no need. It's kind of pricey, but I feel like all protein is and this is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - will recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vega protein powder. Blends very well. Love the taste. I use 1 cup almond milk 1/4 scoop of the Vega protein powder and 2 spoons of the flax- chia mix. 1 min blend. Pause and another 30-40 seconds blend. Perfect all the time. I will say if you are using one whole scoop make sure you have enough liquid otherwise it will be very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I got the berry flavor and it tastes super great! Almost as if I'm drinking a smoothie. It does have a little bit of a gritty taste when I mix with water. It has 30g of protein in 1 serving, which is awesome. I love that I can read a majority of the ingredients and know what they are without having to Google it. Cons: I would say the one downfall is the opening isn't wide enough. Its hard to get that big scoop out with my hand and not spill some all over the place. Sooo a wider opening would be great, if the dev's are reading this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was meh
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for the good ratio of protein to carbs, helps with my macros! I'm not a big fan of the artificial sweetener after taste it has, but the vanilla isn't too bad. Another thing I didn't like about this stuff is the consistency. Maybe it was the addition of the turmeric, but it literally gets everywhere. Tends to clump in the blender too :( I'll try another Vega product, because it has good protein and low carbs, but this one I won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mixed up a shake with this powder stuff, went outside and pulled a tree from the ground!! Amazing stuff, kicked a soccer ball and broke a window twice. In one window and out another. It doesn't stop there, drank some more, watched The Hulk and then thought hey why not. So I went outside and jumped as high as I could. Holy Mackerel!!!! I was not ready for that. The landing put me in the hospital but I jumped over a two story house!!!!!!! This stuff rocks!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shao-Hu

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more in it
customer_reviews.text: it I can definitely feel the results it definitely is clean and works and is great for people who are doing keto and we have dairy issues after being diagnosed with Crohn’s disease I can’t really do a lot of dairy or none at all so I want to get my protein from a plant-based sauce or at least Half of it the smell is a little hard to get over and it’s not filled to the top I kind of feel like that’s a rip off I really hate when protein powders do that but other than that it’s good and I’m not a vegetarian
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Prince

customer_reviews.title: tastes so bad
customer_reviews.text: omg the taste is so bad and it lingers until you eat something else. I've tried to use this in smoothies, mixed into oatmeal, peanut butter and it's so strong and sweet. never again. and now I'm seeing all these reviews about heavy metals? I'm good.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lightning

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients are good but
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the powder was static-y...as in it would fly in the air and attach to the scooper then fall...strange.. it didn't mix too well even in my blender bottle and the flavor was very so-so (chocolate) .. I got it for the ingredients and extra protein amount but the scooper was actually bigger and powder much fluffier which meant it didn't fit in my blender bottle store away well either. I have ended up returning to orgain which has good flavors, better prices and blends perfectly and adding a raw pea protein to boost the protein amt. enjoying this option more.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gross tasting, will never buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is really disgusting. I tried so hard to like this and blended it with many different fruits, tried it in overnight oats, alone, with water, with soy & almond milk, and it’s just gross. The taste is like old chalk and it doesn’t blend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen FP

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really like how well this blends. The formula is nice and light, so that probably helps with it being able to blend easily with milk and/or water. I'm super happy about that, and the great nutrition. I love the 30g of protein per serving and that each serving is relatively low cal with a good (not great) amount of potassium. I reeeally wish the flavor was better. It's like....faintly chocolate if you drink it just water/milk like I do. Not an off-putting flavor, but not really enticing either. It'll add a slight chocolate flavor to a smoothie, but I REALLY wish the chocolate flavor was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Sevcik

customer_reviews.title: A go-to post workout drink!
customer_reviews.text: Shot of energy...and great taste. Adding a mix of berries makes it taste even better. 30g of protein in 1 serving is very convenient...especially for vegans. It is a bit chalky so a little more water is needed. I use a blender to achieve desired mix-consistency.
customer_reviews.author: RealReview

customer_reviews.title: Inflated Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Another case of beware the highest rated item. This is the worst vegan protein I’ve tried. The flavor is overly sweet, and it literally does not blend with whatever mixer you try. Water, oat milk, doesn’t matter. Shaker cup, blender, doesn’t matter. Half the drink is a sandy sludge, the other half is concrete stuck to the bottom of the container. If you’re looking for an alternative to whey, move along, nothing to see here.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I have been working out at a Burn Boot Camp, and they stress the importance of a protein recovery drink within 60 minutes of your workout. They also talk to us about getting enough protein to help your body recover and rebuild after intense workouts. I really like this protein powder and have tried the mocha and vanilla. When I mix in a little vanilla greek yogurt, my shakes have a great creamy flavor and keep me full after a workout. This is a great tasting way to help me get my protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my jam
customer_reviews.text: I've tried em all. The plant-based protein powders and Vega Premium Sport Vanilla is my jam. High protein, low carb, good taste. I usually just drink with ice and water and it's good. If you add other things to your shakes, then this will make a great base as well. I've tried mocha and it made me nauseous. I like Berry for a treat but I can't drink it everyday. I will occasionally will often drink Berry as a snack or dessert, adding frozen berries and sometimes non-dairy milk.
customer_reviews.author: Dinneen Viggiano

customer_reviews.title: Thick, gross and doesn’t mix
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the good reviews, but was super disappointed. Doesn’t mix well (or at all, really) and the taste is so strong that it ruins my smoothies. It’s also incredibly thick so I can’t even just mix it with soy milk and chug it in the mornings. Super bummed, looks like the search for the perfect protein is still on
customer_reviews.author: Morgan S.

customer_reviews.title: Gross taste and gritty
customer_reviews.text: As with a lot of protein powders, I expected this to be gritty, which it was. Even after using the blender. But the worst part. It tastes like amoxicillin! Gross
customer_reviews.author: lizzymac

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews saying they got this with holes in their safety seal causing possible contamination I was little hesitant to order this. There were even reviews that they received half a tub or it may be a fake product compared to the real one. I took a risk anyway and I am one happy customer! No holes, completely sealed and a full tub. The best part?! This tastes delicious in mocha! I’m not sure why other customers received tubs that were tampered with in any way but I hope this encourages others to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor taste / texture
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good... taste is very chalky, does not taste like "mocha" or even chocolate at all. It does not blend well, not matter how much you shake it up in the blender bottle it is still very chunky and sticks to all parts of the bottle. Only benefit is it doesn't upset my stomach like Whey does.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Baenen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Vega protein powder flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really love this flavor and if you like mocha, my bet is you will too. I add coffee concentrate to mine in the morning and mix it with unflavored almond milk. It tastes great the protein count is pretty high too. I've tried many other vegan brands and I haven't been a big fan. For one, they are so gritty and taste unpleasant. This powder is neither gritty or unpleasant. It's very smooth and tastes wonderful. Glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie de Graaf

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: I've had the worst luck finding a protein powder that was suitable for my sensitive tummy & that could also give me that punch of protein I need but I'm STUCK on this one! I've been using it for 6 months now and I reaaally love it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Campbell

customer_reviews.title: my favorite protein ever
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried a variety of protein powders most of them being from whey concentrate. The Vega brand has some of the best tasting product at a slightly expensive price point. The vegan based protein is far less chalky then a majority of the products I have had in the past. Vega has made a life long customer out of me, because I feel better than ever because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Poss

customer_reviews.title: Great powder. Best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Better than vanilla or chocolate for both non-dairy milks or fruit/veggie juice smoothies! Banana 1 ea. BlackBerry, raspberry, and blue berry mix 1 cup 1/2 scoop of Vega one sport powder Spirulina 1 teaspoon 1 1/2 cup of silk vanilla almond milk
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I used to only drink whey protein, but it used to not digest very well. I would often get stomach aches. I've been wary trying to switch over to vegan protein powder because every time I've tried vegan powder in the past it tasted like cardboard. This products tastes good and packs a good amount of protein in it. BE AWARE that "one scoop" of this protein is larger than most protein powder servings, so you'll probably go through it faster too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste... Mr. Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this. I mixed it up after my workout and usually I can choke down something even if its not the greatest but this stuff.. This stuff made me sick to my stomach after the second gulp. Horrible. Taste. Poor mixing. I just poured the rest out. I might have to go back to my BOD post workout. Shew.
customer_reviews.author: Ispend2much$here

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix well, but I still believe it's the best lactose-free protein on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Being horribly lactose intolerant, I've struggled with finding a protein powder that doesn't kill me an hour later. Lactose-free whey, isolate whey, all made me struggle, but Vega sport is really great. No indigestion at all. Doesn't mix very well, however.
customer_reviews.author: Jordie L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Vegan athletes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Vega brand of protein powders for a few months now and I love them! It's the perfect option for people looking to get an all plant based protein that's vegan friendly. The taste is better then most protein powders I have used in the past and is really easy to drink and not super thick, I typically drink the whole 12 oz serving in one shot. I use this in conjunction with the Vega Sport recovery accelerator and its perfect. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Block

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and no breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I began using vegetable based protein as Whey Isolate makes me breakout in the face, or at least that is my observation. I haven't had any breakout problems while consuming it, and that makes me so happy. I got the chocolate flavor and it's quite yummy, texture is very smooth and I just mix with water, shake away and drink.
customer_reviews.author: Anais B Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Best pea protein ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product for awhile now. Best pea protein I've ever found. Most of the others I've tried tasted like grass clippings! Yuck! Really makes a thick smoothie. Really rich chocolate flavor. Blends well with both milk & kefir. Turns into a pudding consistency if you leave it in the fridge...who doesn't like chocolate pudding!!
customer_reviews.author: mel slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome powder, disappointed no scooper
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely annoyed that this protein powder didn't come with a scooper. At first I thought it was stuck at the bottom or something, but after moving the powder around, I didn't find one. Only reason why Im annoyed is due to me having to go an extra step to measuring out the recommended amount of protein instead of just using one scoop with a scooper that is typically provided in protein powder containers. Other than that, I really enjoy this product. Flavor is on point, I can drink this with water or almond milk, it blends perfectly in a hand mixer as well as a machine mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Akari

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor but hard to get to the scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this flavor in the sample pack size before purchasing this tub. Still enjoy the flavor, but sometimes the powder clumps when I mix it in the shaker bottle. I only ever prepare it with water. Would suggest Vega to find a different way to include the scoop since for my experience with this particular tub, it took a while to find the scoop within the mix. Had to convert the measurement using a tablespoon until the scoop appeared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the product due to the fact that it made my stomach upset and gassy actually which is strange because it is plant based right? Had to discontinue after trying it 2 times. Going back to my regular vegan plant based oroteing powders. I do not recommend. Also taste is poor.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN JALILI

customer_reviews.title: For vegan powder, it's fine
customer_reviews.text: You get a good protein bang for your buck with this powder, but the taste is cloyingly, disgustingly sweet. I have to blend it with something bitter like cocoa powder or with plain, unflavored powder in order to make it tolerable. Speaking of blending, it does pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: J Milner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and blends like mud
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try out a different protein powder since I always just buy the giant bag from Costco. Over the years, I've seen a lot of my friends try Vega so I thought I'd give it a shot. Bad idea. This powder is SO THICK. It's difficult to blend in a blender bottle and my ninja blender has trouble blending it for smoothies. This flavor kind of tastes like dirt. Yes, it has a great amount of protein but it's just so hard to drink. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like crap. Yes, very nutritious (which is why I gave it 2 stars), but no matter what I blended it with/mixed it with, it tasted HORRIBLE. Horrible powdery after taste, and some of its other ingredients make it taste bad in general. If you’re not too picky on protein shake taste, and want something nutritious and vegan, this is for you. However, if you’re picky on protein shakes, and want something that tastes good, like me, you will NOT like this.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa L.

customer_reviews.title: Complete plant based protein
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for a few years. I started using the Vega Sport when I started getting serious about improving my health and began working out. The BCAA's in Vega Sport is helpful in muscle recovery after strength training. But it is also beneficial before working out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate drop

customer_reviews.title: A good vegan protein
customer_reviews.text: Vegan protein powders tend to be either chalky or grainy, and although this one could be grainy at times, if you blend it well it tastes really good! I've been using the chocolate flavor for years and personally I love it. I will say it's pretty pricey per serving, but most vegan powders are higher in price than standard whey powders.
customer_reviews.author: Mayte Lara

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Highly rated for acne safe diet! Great flavor. People complain about consistency...I put it in my personal sized blender with almond milk and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: jstarburst81

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand of protein powder for quite a while and it is so worth it. It blends really in the blender and tastes really good! I usually mix almond milk, a scoop of the protein and some strawberries together!
customer_reviews.author: capone

customer_reviews.title: Big scoop
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t really give me a chalky taste, it taste like a vanilla protein bar to me but I thought 1 scoop was 30g of protein and it is but the scoop is huge it’s like 2 regular ones put together so they got me there definitely gave me a good laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: ... through Beach Body as it much cheeper and I love it. It does not upset my stomach
customer_reviews.text: This protein was bought to replace the Vegan Vanilla Protein drink ordered through Beach Body as it much cheeper and I love it. It does not upset my stomach. It was good taste as far as protein drinks go and seems to curb my sweet cravings if I drink it in the beginning of the day after a workout. It is filling and I can also use it as breakfast replacement. I also add the Garden of Life Detoxifiber blend to my shake as well for an extra dose of fiber/detox. Awesome product- I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Unoti

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and tasty
customer_reviews.text: We like this product. We tried it when a coworker gave us a tub. It blends very nicely and is nice tasting. We blend it with half a banana 6 frozen strawberries and a tablespoon of peanutbutter powder PB2. I have it as morning meal and half a scoop as a snack in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Ebol

customer_reviews.title: Flavor soo good
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I been using it for few months now, my problem today was this came with seal open and some of the powder inside the box all over, now I would have send it back but I need it so bad, I keep it like that, I hope I don't get nothing weird. Bottom line is the powder is soo good, that's why I can't send it back, but if next one I get it open then I will.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Baughn

customer_reviews.title: See my comment
customer_reviews.text: Was a little shocked by measuring cup size it’s extraordinarily large but I know why- however I gave this a 4 because there’s a slight after taste. I have been able to use tile to overripe banana or dates to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wallace

customer_reviews.title: wasnt horrible
customer_reviews.text: ive tried alot of protein powders the last few weeks. this one has black specs in it that sink to the bottom of the cup and it threw my stomach off alittle. it is ok tasting though and says it has alot of protein per scoop
customer_reviews.author: enasni706

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and is the perfect post-gym protein powder for my walk home. Just as a general FYI, I've found that a full scoop is more than a serving (44g) so be sure to weigh out if you're being particular about calories/macros.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: blends well, tastes amazing, digests well
customer_reviews.text: this stuff tastes amazing. I put it in the blender with a banana, oats and almond milk. Just the right amount of sweetness and not chalky! my throat isn't all powdery and mucusy after drinking like other blends, it's completely clear and no stomach issues at all. just good energy
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Duran

customer_reviews.title: Going back to http://www.amazon.com/Vega-Sport-Performance-Protein-Vanilla/dp/B005H6UCHS/ref=pd_sim_121_5?ie=UTF8&dpID=41NOEQy0D
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this protein is superior. However, I am not sure what it is, it produces a lot of bloating and gas. I had been using  for 2 years and so I assumed this one would be similar. There must be something higher in fiber. Just FYI for those with intolerance
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: GOOD but...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is worth 5 stars, BUT this container was missing about a quarter of its product. And to add unsult to injury the scoop was buried at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shar

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to purchase through Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand, this size for many years. My dissatisfaction is the over size large container is Decieful because it is only 1/2 full of Protien powder.. The container should be an Honest size while reducing the amount of plastic waste. Also I'm a big man and can hardly get my hand inside the container to use the enclosed scoop. If they have a conscience they should stop this deceitful marketing. Whole Foods could put a little pressure on Vega to change the size container. Cheers,Peter
customer_reviews.author: peter woodcock

customer_reviews.title: hate this flavor
customer_reviews.text: i am a chocolate lover and wow this does not even taste like chocolate. the only way to really be able to drink it is by adding bananas which really mask any flavor or returning it and not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W & Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Great when used with blender only
customer_reviews.text: I love that i I only have to use 1 scoop. Good ingredients. When I use it with my Ninja, its great , but if I use it only with my blender bottle with the swirly ball inside its chalky. It would be great if it doesn't taste chalky without using the machine. P.s. - I followed the right amount of liquid with the amount of scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for recovery, crappy stevia aftertaste, price is all over the map
customer_reviews.text: The stevia aftertaste is abysmal, but this stuff is amazing for recovery after a grueling workout. I work out first thing in the morning, and this makes all the difference in a normal day versus an achy and tired one. I mix in a little PB2 and ground flaxseed with the mocha, and it's quite satiating, too. Just one question: WHY does Amazon keep changing the price from $26 to $54 to $26 to $54? And taking it on/off/on/off Subscribe and Save??
customer_reviews.author: E. Cannaday

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I’m always iffy with buying plant based protein products, but this stuff is amazing. Seriously tastes soooo good. And it doesn’t have a ton of clumps when using with a shaker bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Pass!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers said, the scoop size is bigger which is what accounts for the higher protein in this particular version of Vega. The consistency is fairly gritty but is more fine than their other proteins. For me Vega is a 6/10 - even blended down in a vitamix, there's a strong aftertaste (though not unpleasant) and it simply does not blend as well as some of the other vegan proteins on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gaston

customer_reviews.title: Too thick!
customer_reviews.text: Although the first sip was super chocolatey, this product turned my drink into sludge. It thickened to the point that it almost turned into goop that could have stayed in the bottle. Not a fan at all and won’t be buying this again. I had higher hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Best veggie protein out!
customer_reviews.text: Best veggie protein out there. Blends well with no upset stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Actually Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping around for protein to drink after my daily grind, found this, and was surprised that this thing actually tastes GOOD. Unlike some other of the protein I've used, I don't have a problem getting this protein to dissolve in solution, so it's literally now my "go-to" drink after my daily grind. It feels good that I can actually drink something that doesn't require me to hold my nose and chug it down. Tastes good. Dissolves quick. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: So YUMMY 😋
customer_reviews.text: I tried this, then tried some other brands. None tasted so yummy. It's good for after workout. Keeps me feeling really full for a long time. LOW CALORIE. I wish there was an organic version of this.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit smoothies and baking!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried both the chocolate and mocha flavors of the Vega Sport Performance proteins, and vanilla doesn't disappoint! I requested a sample from the Vega team on social media and loved it so much that I ordered a full tub. While I'm usually a chocolate girl, vanilla is great for fruit smoothies, whereas I don't think I would ever add strawberries and raspberries to my chocolate shakes. ;) I also just began using this flavor for baking quick protein snacks and it's been great so far. I will definitely continue buying!
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Mint gum stuck to bottle
customer_reviews.text: So overall the product seems fine, it came with the seal intact, but there was wad of something sticky on the lid. I thought maybe it was puddy of some sort to keep it from rolling around in the box but when I started trying to remove it I distinctly smelled mint...as in mint chewing gum. I’m confused as to why there was a wad of chewed mint gum stuck to the top of my container...disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Gray G

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good doesn't upset my stomach. I will buy again when on sale. Price is a little high for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious protein powder! I purchased for high protein, and was very pleasantly surprised. I usually mix it with almond milk and frozen berries and make a smoothie and it tastes wonderful. I also like it alone just blended with almond milk. I am sensitive to whey protein and this was perfect since it does not contain that ingredient. Worth the price and will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laken

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, CHOCOLATE !!
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to this brand of protein powder every month. It’s the best tasting and Has the best texture. I’ve tried many plant based powders. #1 in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Nurse BA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate and vanilla are my two go-twos for protein powder. I have been using both flavors and this product for several years now - very happy with the taste and results.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Parish

customer_reviews.title: Chalky but normal
customer_reviews.text: Taste so bad lol and chalky when mixed with only water BUT thats how most protein powders are. The berry flavor is definitely different and isn’t that bad. It sort of tastes like soggy fruity pebbles in my opinion. It doesn’t make me sick like the nonvegan ones. Good for if you are lactose!
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of plant-based protein powders, and this is by far the best one. I received the vanilla that I ordered yesterday and just made some post-workout protein pudding. It mixed better than any kind I've ever had, perfectly smooth with no lumps. It doesn't taste like artificial sweetners, the flavor is perfect! I'm definitely going to stick to this brand from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not loving the Taste...
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing against the ingredients, I love that this product is vegan since I am lactose intolerant and whey that is in most other protein powder hurts my stomach. However, this powder to put it lightly smells and tastes like ASS, sorry. I will finish the product since it is functional but will most likely not purchase another. I recommend adding honey or agave nectar or if smell and taste aren't what you concern yourself with in regards to protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: The best Vega
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, especially because it has probiotics. 30g of protein is difficult to come by. I mix it with frozen fruit too
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G

customer_reviews.title: Great in smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder and have ordered it several times along with the chocolate. My favorite way to use this in a breakfast smoothie with some ice, almond milk, espresso and flax seed. It cuts down on my sugar intake from more expensive coffee shops and get in the extra protein that I need. Con: It is very staticky and tends to stick to the scoop, container, your hands etc. However it's easy to wipe up.
customer_reviews.author: jamerz81

customer_reviews.title: Damaged seal
customer_reviews.text: I just went to open this and there are five little holes on the top. I’ve bought this many times before and never had that so it makes me feel uneasy about what may have been put inside. I’m really disappointed that I ordered it too long go to return it
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The only product ever that I look forward to after a workout
customer_reviews.text: Tried many and always come back yo this! Flavor snd confustency are the treat I expect after a hard workout! I look forward to the protein shake after a hard workout and this is the only product that has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beware of marketing ploy - stick with the 25g version
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I am a huge fan of the Vega protein powders, however, this particular line of protein powders (30g of protein per scoop) is largely a marketing ploy. The scooper is significantly bigger than the other line of protein powder (25g per scoop) and the powder itself is exceptionally fine and is a disaster to actually pour into a drink - a huge cloud of protein powder goes everywhere. There is always a mess. I will not be buying this version again and am disappointed I fell for such a clear marketing scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: Pretty boring, has no real flavor, just like drinking odd powder. Might be ok if you added to a fruit juice or smoothly no to drink by itself with just water.
customer_reviews.author: amaz

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a good protein powder without artificial sweetners in it. I tried another, more expensive brand and couldn't justify the cost for something that tasted just "ok". After doing my research, I ordered this. Love it. It isn't sweetened, but I blend it with a banana, water, ice, and a bit of coconut milk. It's perfect. If I need my caffeine, I'll use coffee instead of water and have my own version of a mocha. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: DerailedDiva

customer_reviews.title: Yummy yum yum
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap!! Yum!!! This is the best plant based protein ever tried mixes so amazingly and tastes so smooth, it also has a green color to it, which I love!! Green=health 🍏
customer_reviews.author: Fucker

customer_reviews.title: actually tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few protein powders that actually tastes good! It's thick and creamy, even when mixed with just water. The chocolate flavor mixed with banana and Greek yogurt and it tastes almost like a milkshake. This is the only protein powder that I enjoy eating.
customer_reviews.author: Claudzee

customer_reviews.title: Vega Sport Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: As someone with a very sensitive stomach, I usually rely on vegan protein supplements to use after workouts since whey and other dairy derivatives are too harsh for me. I have never had any issues with any Vega products, including Vega Sport. The taste is good, especially compared to other vegetarian and vegan proteins I've had, and the protein content is some of the highest. I've only tried the vanilla, so I cannot speak for the taste of others, but I do highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein powder with great protein sources!
customer_reviews.text: The entire family loves the Vega Sport Protein Powder Mocha! It tastes incredibly good as a wonderful protein source. Since I was looking for the BEST protein powder for months I found in Vega Sport Protein Powder the ideal product. - super delicious - very good sources of protein - wonderful additions (BCAAs and Amino Acids) - NO weird smells - NO graininess - NO artificial tastes
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, mixes easily. Winning.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I’ve gotten to the point where I can’t fit into my leather motorcycle racing suit. So no more carbs in the morning. This stuff instead.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee InfusionTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: It has the ingredients that I am ok with and best of all it tastes good. I wish the stevia was omitted tho. I'd rathere sweeten it myself with something less questionable
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to get used to
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the tart cherry flavor. Also the powder is pretty thick. I finally got used to the taste after day 5 of having it. So if you're not a cherry person try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Asi Afuhaamango

customer_reviews.title: The Taste is awful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product at all. I was using different product before but this one is really bad!!! Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali F.

customer_reviews.title: Awful/ super thick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of different protein powders. This was my first time trying a plant based protein. I went with this brand because of the good reviews. But I was literally the WORST protein I’ve ever had. It is also very very very thick. I added water and it still wouldn’t dilute it. Will be sending back if allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: but I don't like taking dairy products
customer_reviews.text: I'm not vegan, but I don't like taking dairy products. This stuff is delicious. Better than the whey chocolate proteins I have used. I had gotten a free sample of the vanilla Vega Sport and loved it, so I thought I'd try chocolate. Even better! But the non-sport variety, Vega Protein & Greens Vanilla, is yuckeroni! Stay away from that one. Grrrross. Chalk is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Babich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this protein, is one of few that doesn’t upset my stomach. It’s a little thick so I would suggest adding a bit more water than the recommended portion. Vanilla and chocolate flavor are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Paola R.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't blend well
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder tastes good however it doesn't blend well. I made a smoothie and I feel the chalkyness in my mouth. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: dionne

product_meta.title: Vega Sport Premium Protein Powder, Vanilla, Plant Based Protein Powder Post Workout - Certified Vegan, Vegetarian, Keto-Friendly, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, BCAA Amino Acid (20 Servings / 1lb 13.2oz)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:VanillaHelp rebuild muscle after a tough workout with Vega Sport Vanilla Protein Powder. You’ll get 30 grams of plant-based protein, 5g BCAAs, 2 billion CFU of probiotics (bacillus coagulans), and tart cherry to support recovery post workout. Multi source vegan protein powder from pea protein, pumpkin seed, organic sunflower seed, and alfalfa provides a complete amino acid profile containing all 9 essential amino acids. Our plant protein powder is vegetarian, dairy free, lactose free, gluten free and soy free to fit your lifestyle. Certified for athletes, Vega Sport Premium Protein is NSF Certified for Sport. Shake or blend with water, almond milk or other non-dairy milk alternative - or add some fruits and veggies for a nutrient-rich protein shake. Try it in Chocolate, Vanilla, Mocha, or Berry or Peanut Butter. This product is keto friendly. We recommend adding coconut oil to your favorite smoothie or shake for a little extra fat. Not a medical food.

BRAND STORY
By Vega
feature_bullets: 30 GRAMS OF PLANT BASED PROTEIN POWDER with 5g BCAA amino acids and 5g Glutamic Acid. Amino Acid profile containing 9 essential amino acids from pea protein powder, pumpkin seed, organic sunflower seed.
SUPPORT RECOVERY POST WORKOUT with ingredients like tart cherry, turmeric extract and 2 billion CFU probiotics (bacillus coagulans) to help build muscle and support recovery.
SMOOTH TASTE AND TEXTURE, just blend or shake with water or your choice of beverage post workout – or even add some fruit to make a tasty protein packed smoothie
20 SERVINGS PER CONTAINER, contents may settle during shipping. Don’t worry, that’s normal. You’re still getting all the servings listed on your product.

MADE FOR ATHLETES - NSF Certified for Sport, Non-GMO Project Verified, Certified Vegan protein powder and gluten free. Vega is proud to be voted #1 Sport Nutrition Product of the Year in the Consumer Survey of Product Innovation 2020, Sports Nutrition category. A survey of 40,000 people by Kantar.
KETO-FRIENDLY PROTEIN POWDER for women and men with 3g net carbs, and no artificial sweeteners, flavors or colors, lactose and dairy free, soy free and non whey. *not a medical food

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
